Trade/Device Name(s): AtheNA Multi-Lyte Borrelia VlsE-1/pepC10 Plus Test System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): AtheNA Multi-Lyte Data Analysis Package Version 3.0
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AtheNA Multi-Lyte Borrelia VlsE-1/pepC10 Plus Test System detecting antibodies to Borrelia in human serum using a multiplexed bead-based immunoassay platform.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of IgG antibody to recombinant VlsE-1 and IgM antibody to synthetic pepC10 in human serum for patients with symptoms or history of Lyme Borreliosis; all positives require confirmation with second-tier test such as Western Blot.
